titleStmt.title: The history of the Sevarites or Sevarambi, a nation inhabiting part of the third continent commonly called Terræ australes incognitæ with an account of their admirable government, religion, customs, and language / written by one Captain Siden, a worthy person, who, together with many others, was cast upon those coasts, and lived many years in that country.
Histoire des Sevarambes. English
titleStmt.author: Allais, Denis Vairasse d', ca. 1630-1672.

titleStmt.title: The history of the Sevarites or Sevarambi, a nation inhabiting part of the third continent commonly called Terræ australes incognitæ with an account of their admirable government, religion, customs, and language / written by one Captain Siden, a worthy person, who, together with many others, was cast upon those coasts, and lived many years in that country.
Histoire des Sevarambes. English
titleStmt.author: Allais, Denis Vairasse d', ca. 1630-1672.
Roberts, A., 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Written by D. Vairasse. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
The second part has separate t.p. with imprint date 1679.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
With: The history of the Sevarites or Sevarambi ... The second part ... London : Printed by J.M. for Henry Brome ..., 1679 (Wing V20A).
